mapper.sql: a.id, a.hotelname, a.hotelcontactname, a.regtime, a.disid, a.detailaddr, a.longitude, a.latitude, a.opentime, a.repairtime, a.roomnum, a.businesslicensefront, a.businesslicenseback, a.pms, a.visible, a.online, a.idcardfront, a.idcardback, a.retentiontime, a.defaultleavetime, a.needwait, a.hotelphone, a.isnewpms, a.introduction, a.traffic, a.hotelpic, a.peripheral, a.priority, a.rulecode
mapper.select:
select
from t_hotel a where id = #{id} limit 1

select
from t_hotel where pms = #{pms} and pmsopttime < ${time} limit 1

select
from t_hotel a where a.id is not null

select c.code as citycode, c.cityid, c.cityname, b.disname,d.proname as province,
from t_hotel a left outer join t_district b on a.disid = b.id left outer join t_city c on c.cityid = b.cityid left outer join t_province d on c.proid=d.proid where a.id is not null
and a.id = #{id} limit 1

select c.code as citycode, c.cityid, c.cityname, b.disname,
from t_hotel a left outer join t_district b on a.disid = b.id left outer join t_city c on c.cityid = b.cityid where a.id is not null
and a.id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert:
update t_hotel
roomnum=#{roomnum},
online=#{online},
isnewpms=#{isnewpms},
pmsopttime=#{pmsopttime},
where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select hotelname as name , hotelpic from t_hotel where id=#{hotelid} union select b.name,pics as hotelpic from t_roomtype b left join t_roomtype_info a on a.roomtypeid=b.id where thotelid=#{hotelid};
